synopsis: A gang of thieves is in conflict due to loot sharing. The gang leader takes half of the loot, while the rest of the gang has to share the other half. Considering it unfair, they revolt against their leader.
casting: ['Murat Soydan', 'Cem Karaca', 'Figen Han', 'Atilla Ergün', 'Ahmet Danyal Topatan', 'Hayal Sirer', 'Zeki Tüney', 'Ahmet Kostarika']
